Text: may someone tell me how you to download all the articles of Wikipedia??? perhaps the torrent is not fake but I just wanna to know how they do it????
Everything is in the torrent, if you want to download separatly the software and the content, go directly to http://www.kiwix.org
The point is to have an offline encyclopedia in case you're without the Internet for an extended period.
Does this come with images?  I've noticed the rar says nopic, but this torrent is ten gigabytes larger than another Jan 2012 Kiwix torrent.
